p:
Relative yield per plant of species a or b in a mixed culture with species b or a was calculated as:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \mathrm{R}{\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{a}}={\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{a}\mathrm{b}}/{\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{a}}\mathrm{or}\ \mathrm{R}{\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{b}}={\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{b}\mathrm{a}}/{\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{b}} $$\end{document}
R
Y a
=
Y ab
/
Y a
or
R
Y b
=
Y ba
/
Y b
